data.sampled:
The value of x can be found using the following steps:

Step 1: Move all terms containing x to one side of the equation and all other terms to the other side.

−2x + 4(1 + 8x) = −174

Step 2: Factor the left-hand side of the equation.

−2x − 4(1 + 8x) = -174

x( −2 − 4(1 + 8x)) = -174

Step 3: Solve the equation for x.

x = - (174 / ( −2 − 4(1 + 8x)))

x = - (174 / (16 + 32x))

Now that we have the value for x, we can replace x with its value and simplify the equation.

−2x − 4(1 + 8x) = −174

−2(−(174 / (16 + 32x))) + 4(1 + 8x) = −174

−2(−174) + 4(1 + 8x) = −174

−348 + 4(1 + 8x) = −174

4(1 + 8x) = −348 + 174

4(1 + 8x) = -482

Step 4: Solve the equation for x.

x = (482 / 8) - 2

x = 59.875 - 2

x = 57.875

The value of x can be simplified to 57
